mapper.sql: from sales_order_info I join meta_data_business B on I.company_code = B.company_code join sales_order_product P on I.order_code = P.order_code join meta_data_product M on M.product_code = P.product_code
group by I.order_code, B.name, I.order_date, I.request_date
mapper.select:
select I.order_code, B.name AS company_name ,I.order_date, I.request_date
sales_status = 'requested'
order by I.request_date ASC

select P.product_code , M.name , P.sales_quantity ,I.order_code
I.order_code = #{order_code} and sales_status = 'requested'
mapper.update:

mapper.select: SELECT SUM(I.in_quantity) - IFNULL(SUM(O.out_quantity), 0) AS stock_quantity, I.product_code, M.name, (select sales_quantity from sales_order_product where order_code=#{order_code} and product_code=#{product_code}) AS sales_quantity FROM in_warehouse I LEFT JOIN out_warehouse O ON I.product_code = O.product_code join meta_data_product M on I.product_code = M.product_code GROUP BY I.product_code having I.product_code =#{product_code}

select I.order_code, B.name AS company_name, I.order_date, I.request_date
and sales_status = 'requested'
order by I.request_date ASC
